website_summaries.verdict: Helps keep your floors looking new and does a good job of making little scratches disappear.
pros: Leaves them shiny and high gloss
Does not take a lot of effort to get good-looking results
cons: Sometimes the finish can seem a little greasy

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than refinishing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! We bought a house with old wood floors that were a mess. I tried this as an alternative to refinishing them and it did the trick. When it goes on the floors will be super glossy, the gloss calms down to a clean looking shine when they are dry. I’ll be applying this every 4-6 months, I’m very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: handsomehansdog

customer_reviews.title: Worked great to bring my old soft-wood floors to a closer ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to bring my old soft-wood floors to a closer version of original, even though they were close to 50 years old and never refinished. The shine did not look fake or waxy, was not oily or slippery and did not come off on clothes/rugs/hands when rubbing it. It lasted a good 4 months before starting to fade a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Arcs

customer_reviews.title: Best product we have found for our original floors in both of our Historic BnBs.
customer_reviews.text: A true and honest review after a couple of years using Restore. Best stuff on the market! I own two Historic Bed and Breakfast in KY with original hardwood floors throughout them both. This by far is the longest lasting, most effective product we have tried at both Bourbon Manor and Maple Hill Manor. We have tried numerous brands and products , but nothing “outshines”, lol, Restore. It’s becoming harder to find locally. I really hope Amazon never stops carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: RTH

customer_reviews.title: I can see myself in the floor
customer_reviews.text: I clean houses for a living and nothing leaves a beautiful shine and finish like LiquidGold. I have used Method wood floor cleaner and Bona and they don't compare. My clients have two dogs that run crazy on the wood floors and leave their paw marks everywhere. I steam clean them then apply LiquidGold and they shine like new.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Doody

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as described
customer_reviews.text: I used this on clean floors in one small room and was actually very careful about how I applied it. Unfortunately, this product had many 4 star reviews that it didn't live up to. I compared it to the flooring in another room that was untreated and I saw no difference between the flooring in the two rooms. I don't know if the bottle I got was just no good but it was a waste of time and I'm returning the product. I'll be happy to just get my money back... As long as it doesn't cause problems that I'm now reading about in the 1 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardine Cizmar

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Included a before and after shot of my dining room floor. Really satisfied with the results. I have three small kids and two large dogs so my wood floors take a beating. I damp mopped, waited for it to dry then mopped this on with a Mr Clean sponge mop. I did have to do 2-3 coats in high traffic areas. My floors look great and clean!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyF

customer_reviews.title: Worst product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is the worst product I ever used. My house is brand new and I desired to give a special finish to the hardwood. I booth this product and it has been a nightmare to removed it... first day the it looked amazing but after a few days it started to come off and my floor looks horrible. Some spaces are white... I’m trying to find a product to removed it without damage the hardwood.
customer_reviews.author: MariSa Burciaga

customer_reviews.title: This product is not only for hardwood floors - it works fine on porous tile
customer_reviews.text: Although I used the product on hardwood floors, I also used the product on porous tile on my front porch. Over the years, the porous tiles had lost their gloss and had faded from the sun. When I applied this product to the porous tiles, the product was absorbed into the tile. This process caused a sealing effect of the faded tiles. The tiles now have a renewed gloss. Furthermore, the product has restored a major portion of the color that was previously visible in the tiles. Bottom line, I am very pleased with this product. It is not only for hardwood but also for restoring the appearance of faded porous porch tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler2014

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but effective!!
customer_reviews.text: My hardwood floors shine like new money. I am very pleased with the restoration of floors with scratch removal and high gloss shine. I am just disappointed in the high cost for such a small amount of product. I have to buy two bottles just to do the first floor of my home. I do love the compliments and the beauty of my hardwood floors. My neighbors walked in and asked me what did I use on my floors; they looks like new! Great product, despite the price. I guess you pay for quality!
customer_reviews.author: lynda

customer_reviews.title: Have pictures you decide. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle actually goes a long way. It doesn't really take a whole lot of the floor restore product to cover a large area. In general it did shine the floor up. I'm thinking about doing a second coat you see if that doubles the shine. See my pics. The pic of two the top one has the shine.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Libby

customer_reviews.title: Worked miracles on 50+ year old flooring.
customer_reviews.text: Worked miracles on 50+ year old flooring. The flooring had only been waxed and polished, never sealed, then covered by carpet. When the house was put up for sale I tried this product. Love Liquid Gold, and this flooring product worked so well at giving the wood a shine and protection.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother of 5

customer_reviews.title: LEFT NO RESIDUE AND RESTORED SHININESS
customer_reviews.text: I tried some other products and they all left residue on the hardwood. This is the only one not and it really restored the shininess.
customer_reviews.author: Annie B

customer_reviews.title: Try it you might like it as well
customer_reviews.text: It works great your floor would look like new. only bad thing is that if you dragg something or your dog has long claws and walks on it you could see scratches on top of the surface right away it will go away until you use this restorer again , because water only will not do the trick and that bothers me but it does restores ....
customer_reviews.author: Maria B Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY floor cleaner I’ll use!! The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Best floor cleaner that TRULY SHINES your floors without leaving icky buildup! This stuff is getting harder & harder to find in stores- I hope they aren’t about to discontinue this magic formula? The almond scent is so pleasant and makes my whole house smell heavenly!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Effort to Maintain an Protect Hard Wood Floor
customer_reviews.text: You'll have to figure out how to use the proper amount. Use too much- sticky. Not enough streaks. However, left floor with satiny shine. And is now much more dust and scratch resistant. Applying definitely worth the effort
customer_reviews.author: Vincent C. Granata

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Use other Scott products with success. This product on our hardwood floors really doesn't so anything. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: marichal

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use of the product - my husband cleaned the wood floors, and applied this in stages so we could still navigate thru our home, and the floor look positively brand new! What a shine. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton Mason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: What a difference. I out about 2-3 coats and it’s been about 4 months and it still shines. Love this product and would def buy again. Probably should use yearly!!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: for high gloss, it works
customer_reviews.text: used on “swedish” (aka satin finish) finish fir floor to get high gloss shine. only do two coats; more and it dulls back. excellent product. tried three others and they didn’t gloss.
customer_reviews.author: donnyPT

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Provides a nice luster to the floor which can be built up to a high shine with additional applications. Its exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C.E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Need to apply sparingly. Is thick. Excellent shine and lasts
customer_reviews.author: Pajoe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shine
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. Great shine on my floors. It’s true if you let water stand it will cause a white stain. This may happen on any wood floor. Before my next wax I’m going good stuffto do a vinegar and water cleaning to help remove waxy build up. But I will use the product again.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: This met my hisband’s expectation but not mine. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This met my hisband’s expectation but not mine. I want a floor that shines. This is more of a flat shine.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: Hides the scratches
customer_reviews.text: Moved the freezer on Laminate flooring, scratches were noticeable, used this product and they were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Osborn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZON has a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every wax! This is the best wax for my floors, And they are wooden floors. I marked them all the time, and the wax does not come off. AMAZON has a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Makes my old floors look great and doesn't smell too strong
customer_reviews.author: jill smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: My hardwood floors looked worn out and I tried multiple products to bring a shine back. Tried this--one coat looked pretty good, second coat a day later and the floors look great. I ordered 2 more bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: it really works
customer_reviews.text: Tired and worn out woods floors will love this product. on my second bottle
customer_reviews.author: Brett Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My floors never look the same. Great product and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Villarosa

customer_reviews.title: Good product restore and shine
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does it restore and shine
customer_reviews.author: Tray

customer_reviews.title: Did not expect it to restore floors from 1932!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a home and we have hard wood, it is matte and just unappealing. I put this bad boy on them and they look BRAND NEW!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever used. It is easy, no smells, no mess no slippery. My old looking hardwood floor looks like brand new! Shinny and clean. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Shine
customer_reviews.text: This makes my floor shine and prevents scratches, it is hard to find and i don't want to use anything else. easy application
customer_reviews.author: shorty524

customer_reviews.title: Puts a beautiful shine on wood
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other brands but none can compare with Scott’s Liquid Gold
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Magic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Brought my dull, worn floors back to its original luster. Photo shows 1/2 of area with treated product (fully dried), and other untreated.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Woods

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Did an excellent job. Floors looked almost new. Covered scratches well.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, clean and shine the floor well.
customer_reviews.author: Ayako

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works so Great!!! I love how it makes my floors shine
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing!!! Brings back shine without stickiness to wooden floors!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen nardino

customer_reviews.title: Scott's Liquid Floor Restore & Renew
customer_reviews.text: Good product and does what it states on the bottle it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Crawford

customer_reviews.title: This really works
customer_reviews.text: My hard wood floors, makes them beautiful, the only thing I will use
customer_reviews.author: malinda beshears

customer_reviews.title: Very shiny floors.
customer_reviews.text: Liked this product the shine lasts a long time more than a month.
customer_reviews.author: roseanne armendariz

customer_reviews.title: Great Luster and Shine Like Gold!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a great product to Bring back shine in Hardwood Floors! Very Happy With the Results!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good wood finish product b
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product all the time for my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Francis h.

customer_reviews.title: the finish
customer_reviews.text: I liked the finish of the wood after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the spray you can buy at grocery. This is way better and my floors look great.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Marks

customer_reviews.title: Truely Liquid Gold!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, gave life back to my long neglected wood floors. What happened to the old Liquid Gold? Years ago I used it on everything, now this is the only Liquid Gold product I can find. I'm real happy to have it! I just wonder why it was so hard to find, and why it is only for floors now. I would love to have it all again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Bad company
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Made a smeary streaky mess of our floors. Took weeks to remove the residue. Contacted the company repeatedly to return the product and never heard back
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Worst mistake I made to use this on my hardwood ...
customer_reviews.text: Worst mistake I made to use this on my hardwood floors. Three weeks later and still trying to get the residue up after only one use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kudos for this amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to refinish my hardwood kitchen floor, but it now looks like new!! I will use the remainder on the rest of my hardwood flooring and then will order again. I was amazed at the job this product did and delighted at the cost savings for having them professionally re-finished.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Freedberg

customer_reviews.title: Still delivers!
customer_reviews.text: Tried and true staple still outperforms the newer products on hard wood.
customer_reviews.author: Coco Channel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, best used on a floor in GREAT ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this on very worn wooden floors. Great product, best used on a floor in GREAT condition to give it some gloss and protect it. If the floor is worn and porous it will NOT cover as much as the bottle states. Floors in great condition will require less. I have included some pictures of our results.
customer_reviews.author: Richie IT

customer_reviews.title: they call it liquid gold for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: REally shines up dull, scratched, uneven, old wood floors. It does fade after awhile, so I'm looking for something with more "stick" but if you're moving out and want your security deposit back, a little almond stick (for scratches) mop with a good cleaner then give one or two coats of this and let dry.... the landlord will be in awe.. or at least you'll get money back for not ruining the floors.
customer_reviews.author: z. just z.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to apply and the shine is restored immediately
customer_reviews.text: A miracle product!!!! I was about to spend almost $3000. to have my hardwood floors resanded and polyed when all they needed was a couple of coats of this product. So easy to apply and the shine is restored immediately. I applied it weeks ago, mopped the floors and the shine is still there .Thank you Liquid Gold and thank you Amazon for carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: longtime Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: This product can create more harm than good.
customer_reviews.text: Yes this product made the floors look beautiful. BUT, if something drips on the floor and is not wiped up immediately, it can leave a drip spot that does NOT wash off! I called the company and they suggested sanding with a very light sandpaper to remove the spot. This works but I have yet to try to"touch up" the small areas where I sanded. One such spot was caused by dog saliva from him panting. I will not use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Custome

customer_reviews.title: Makes floors look new
customer_reviews.text: There’s nothing wrong with my hardwood floors but they were looking dull and dirty no matter Howrah I cleaned them. This did the trick. Just gave them a tiny bit of shine so they look clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Conn

customer_reviews.title: Easy on.  Shines like gold.
customer_reviews.text: You must prep floor well. Clean. Then clean with soap and water. Dry completely. Then three coats of this throughout the day. It takes time to do it really well. Results are impressive. Look amazing. No wax buildup. Thin coats. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: Acura2013

customer_reviews.title: YECCHH!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you LOVE the L.G. spray, you'll HATE this. Returning immediately. Smells like plastic chemicals, leaves thick streaky cloudy residue. Nothing like the spray, awful awful stuff.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Leaves haze on real wood flooring
customer_reviews.text: ruined my oak flooring. Left a haze that I am trying to figure out how to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Ma

customer_reviews.title: Good as new!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a new house a few months ago and the previous owners had rugs in just about every room. When we moved in, the hardwood that was under those rugs was visibility more dull than the rest of the floors. Two coats of this with a damp sponge mop and the floors are as good as new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eyeris

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Takes merely minutes to mop on and there is a wonderful shine left!! Really flawless for QUICK AND EASY results. I used my before relatives came from out of town and got lots of compliments about my wall to wall beautifully shiny wood floors. Do this instead of painful (costly and inconvenient) refinishing....much the same results without the cash or time lost.
customer_reviews.author: Luluru

customer_reviews.title: Worse product ever
customer_reviews.text: Ruined my floors. Wish someone would sue the company. This product is not for wood floors left a white film on my floor which does not come off unless u scrub with vinegar n ammonia. Never ever use this product. You have been warned!!??
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Magnocavallo

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hardwood floors look like new
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really is liquid gold. I’m amazed at how good my floor look after using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Art School Dropout

customer_reviews.title: Product and Service both Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Did what instructions said. Tested on a small spot first. Worked and looked fine, Then used it in entire room, and once my dogs stepped on it - disaster. And I let it dry for three days. The dogs’ nails are short but the scratch the surface all over. What’s worse is Scott’s hasn’t returned my email in 2 weeks or returned multiple phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: MB in FL

customer_reviews.title: Good on old and new!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this on both very old and rather new wood floors. Goes a long way toward conditioning the old, worn floors. Shines the new ones right up. The older floors get better with each use 1x month). Super easy to use, but respect the instructions about replacing rugs and furniture. Can definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Created sticky white film on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Made my wooden floor white and sticky film. Had a hard time walking it off.Never again this product.
customer_reviews.author: andrea Mejtova

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders on old wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job shining up and protecting the old wood floors in our home. The floors had long been neglected and some areas were even too far gone for this to perk up, but a majority of them looked great afterward and was a lot less of a hassle than a full blown sanding and refinishing would have been.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hilt

customer_reviews.title: Great for dull worn wood floors.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great on old, dull wood floors, It renews and shines. I really liked how they look. Try it, you'll like It!
customer_reviews.author: Miss T

customer_reviews.title: Makes our floors gleam!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to deep clean our hardwood in our home built in 1896. Didn't want original floors replaced, just look good enough for the right people to want to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ramey Hill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome floor cleaner!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to try on my wood floors. I am so glad I tried this product!! It adds a nice gloss over and makes the floor look clean and new! I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chesnut

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful results - But not easy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful results. Floor looks years younger. Actually applying it is easy. But the proper prep and time to cure is difficult and long.
customer_reviews.author: The Min

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. It made my 28 year old hardwood floors look like new. Buy this it will not disappoint you. I’m so happy I wish I had found it years ago!
customer_reviews.author: sandra Andracsek

customer_reviews.title: Covers minor scratches extremely well
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased - Floor Restore did a particularly good job covering the fine scratches in the floor from our cat's nails. I've polished with old fashioned wax, and used other products, but this seemed to work the best - I'd buy it again. My only issue: our floors are semi-gloss, and this is a gloss finish.
customer_reviews.author: Ed in NY

customer_reviews.title: Good for gun stocks
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cleaning my Beretta silver pigeon and CZ shotgun stocks. It works great and it's better than anything else I've tried
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Smith

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is amazing will be buying again for the rest of my ...
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing will be buying again for the rest of my house. only used it in the bedroom that we were re-doing and it mad the ashen floors look so much better. brought back from the dead.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Y.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it, will buy again...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for wood floors! Easy to sappy and easy to dry
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: Brought life back to 20 year old hardwood. Three kids are rough on floors, this gives me hope that I won't have to replace everything then they move out.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Used on hardwoods that got scuffed up during a remodeling project. It worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: NicMo

customer_reviews.title: The shine and luster last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. If your wood floor is worn, dingy and you cannot afford to sand and stain, this is the product to use. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Betty

customer_reviews.title: This product worked great. On our old oak floors
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great. On our old oak floors, it shined like new. I would definitely recommend this product. Glad I got an extra bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Just Eh
customer_reviews.text: Fixed a large scuff mark but made the small scratches more obvious
customer_reviews.author: Toddlin' Across America

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave our old floors a new life --- but it will scratch if you move furniture around on it.
customer_reviews.author: Crocky

customer_reviews.title: Looks like new. Using this product is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I lived in my condo since 1989 (owned). Built in 1980 with parquet flooring in my kitchen. Looks like new. Using this product is fantastic. Sorry nothing negative. Just happy taste buds. If you want to indulge this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shine
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best product hands down. I have tried everything - yes - EVERYTHING to refurbish my 60 year old hard wood floors. This product is phenomenal!!! I went back and bought more so I don’t run out.

customer_reviews.title: quick and easy product to bring new life to your floors
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Takes 10 min to apply. Floors look much better and I'm satisfied with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever
customer_reviews.text: You want to restore you floors shine easily this is for you ! It’s awesome

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I will not use anything else on my floor but this. It keeps the floor shiny for weeks. This is a must hv item.

customer_reviews.title: excellent shine
customer_reviews.text: gave a great shine to my 15 year old wood floors - dont hesitate to buy

customer_reviews.text: Liquid gold is on point with a nice shine. It is not a high gloss but a shine. It is a Great product for my old tired hardwood floors.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome results!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product -- works so very well. I apply it with a damp sponge instead of a mop for better control. Takes a little longer but worth the extra effort.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy R.

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenated wood floors
customer_reviews.text: My floors never looked better. Takes the thirst out of wood floors

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It looked great for a few days but the scratches showed up after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Anita P. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwood floors!
customer_reviews.text: I love the shiny finish this puts on my hardwoods.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lindner

customer_reviews.title: Brings life back to old floors!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive I bought a few bottles and will buy more to finish the house.’
customer_reviews.author: ModernCouponing

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Went on easy. Looks great. Lasting so far. Husband keeps commenting how great the floors look.
customer_reviews.author: klscsco

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It made my wood floors look beautiful.0nI the first try. With no effort. Everybody buy it. For 10$ my floors look new.
customer_reviews.author: laurylokeefe

customer_reviews.title: Will never use another polish for hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Once you use it once on your hardwood floors, you will not use anything else to polish them. When used, floors look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Cheek2

customer_reviews.title: It's like Liquid Gold!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply with a sponge type mop and it restored the look of my parquet flooring
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shine, shine. Shine!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always have used rejuvenat on my floors and this does the exact same, if not better, at a much cheaper cost
customer_reviews.author: Customer #1

customer_reviews.title: Mirror shine..love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product..best I have found for my hardwood floors
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hart

product_meta.title: Scott's Liquid Gold Restore | Renews & Protects Hardwood Floors | Quick & Easy Way to Help Hide Scratches & Imperfections While Leaving a Clean, Bright Finish | 24 Oz
product_meta.description: Style Name:Floor RestoreIf you are looking for a way to renew and protect dull and worn hardwood floors, this 24 ounce floor restore is perfect for you! It enhances the natural warmth and beauty of hardwood floors and provides long lasting durability and shine in high traffic areas.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
